Plot: After his wife is assaulted, a husband enlists the services of a vigilante group to help him settle the score. Then he discovers they want a 'favor' from him in return.
Title: Seeking Justice
Writer: Todd Hickey (story), Robert Tannen (screenplay), Robert Tannen (story)
Actors: Nicolas Cage, January Jones, Guy Pearce, Harold Perrineau
tomatoConsensus: Seeking Justice is nothing more than a typical potboiler with another phoned-in performance by Nicolas Cage.
